price: Vois ce à quoi ils te comparent! Ils s’égarent donc et sont incapables de trouver un chemin (vers la vérité).
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
